#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<map>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
#include<malloc.h>
#include <sstream>
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define p(n) printf("%d\n",n)
#define mod 1000000007

int main()
{
	int t;
	double h,m,k;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>h>>m;
		
		
		if(h>23 || h<0 || m>60 || m<0)
		cout<<"Invalid Time"<<endl;
		else
		{	
			if(h>12)
		    h=h-12;
		    h=h+m/60;
		    k=fabs(m*6-h*30);
			if(k<180)
			//cout<<h*30-m*6<<endl;
			printf("%0.1lf\n",k);
			else
			printf("%0.1lf\n",360-k);
			
			//cout<<360-(h*30-m*6)<<endl;
		}
	}
}
